At this point, seein g=
the new upgraded flaming PHOENIX of RODIMUS PRIMAL shooting up through the =
air, DINOBOT sent a message to any PREDACONS within his communications rang=
e - even assuming that he COULD communicate within a short range.

"I sugge=
st an expeditious retreat is in order./  We are outmatched here, and there =
is nothing to gain from further combat..  Let the MAXIMALS deal with it."  =
Assuming, of course, anyone was within range and his radio worked!
